mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM THISREPORT A LEFT JOIN THISREVIEW B ON A.REPORT_NO = B.REPORT_NO LEFT JOIN TMSTMEMBER C ON B.M_NO = C.M_NO WHERE ( #{param1} = 1 AND LOWER(C.M_ID) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{param2}) || '%') OR ( #{param1} = 2 AND LOWER(C.M_ID) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{param2}) || '%' AND NVL(B.RESTRICT_FLAG,'N') = 'Y') OR ( #{param1} = 3 AND LOWER(C.M_ID) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{param2}) || '%' AND NVL(B.RESTRICT_FLAG,'N') = 'N')

SELECT A.REVIEW_NO ,A.S_NAME ,A.REPORT_TYPE ,A.REVIEW_CONTENT ,A.M_ID ,A.M_NO ,A.RESTRICT_FLAG ,TO_CHAR(A.REPORT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') AS REPORT_DATE FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.REPORT_DATE DESC) AS ROW_NUM ,B.REVIEW_NO ,C.S_NAME ,E.CODENAME AS REPORT_TYPE ,B.REVIEW_CONTENT ,D.M_ID ,D.M_NO ,B.RESTRICT_FLAG ,A.REPORT_DATE FROM THISREPORT A LEFT JOIN THISREVIEW B ON A.REPORT_NO = B.REPORT_NO LEFT JOIN TMSTSTAY C ON B.S_NO = C.S_NO LEFT JOIN TMSTMEMBER D ON B.M_NO = D.M_NO LEFT JOIN TMSTCODE E ON E.GRPCODE = 10 AND A.REPORT_TYPE = E.CODE WHERE ( #{param1} = 1 AND LOWER(D.M_ID) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{param2}) || '%') OR ( #{param1} = 2 AND LOWER(D.M_ID) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{param2}) || '%' AND NVL(B.RESTRICT_FLAG,'N') = 'Y') OR ( #{param1} = 3 AND LOWER(D.M_ID) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{param2}) || '%' AND NVL(B.RESTRICT_FLAG,'N') = 'N') ) A WHERE A.ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{param3} AND #{param4} ORDER BY ROW_NUM ASC

SELECT A.REPORT_NO ,C.S_NAME ,E.CODENAME AS REPORT_TYPE ,B.REVIEW_CONTENT ,D.M_ID ,( CASE B.RESTRICT_FLAG WHEN 'Y' THEN '차단 중' WHEN 'N' THEN '차단 되지 않음' END ) AS RESTRICT_NAME ,A.REPORT_DATE ,A.REPORT_CONTENT FROM THISREPORT A LEFT JOIN THISREVIEW B ON A.REPORT_NO = B.REPORT_NO LEFT JOIN TMSTSTAY C ON B.S_NO = C.S_NO LEFT JOIN TMSTMEMBER D ON B.M_NO = D.M_NO LEFT JOIN TMSTCODE E ON E.GRPCODE = 10 AND A.REPORT_TYPE = E.CODE WHERE A.REPORT_NO = #{param1}
mapper.update: UPDATE THISREVIEW SET RESTRICT_FLAG = #{param2} WHERE M_NO = #{param1}
